source: AI Prospector — 20mi radius from Latrobe, PA (2026-02-19)

prospects.name: Westmoreland Mall (CBL Properties)
prospects.notes: 850,000 SF super-regional mall. Massive multi-acre parking lot, high traffic, heavy vehicle wear. Largest lot in the area.

prospects.name: Greengate Centre (Kroenke Group)
prospects.notes: Major power center anchored by Walmart, Ross, Petco, Jo-Ann. Enormous parking field serving dozens of retailers.

prospects.name: Independence Health / Excela Latrobe Hospital
prospects.notes: Hospital campus with extensive visitor/staff/ER parking. High 24/7 traffic causes constant wear. Multiple lots across campus.

prospects.name: Independence Health / Excela Westmoreland Hospital
prospects.notes: 373-bed hospital. Very large campus parking serving staff, visitors, ER. Heavy daily use.

prospects.name: Unity Plaza (The Leathery Company)
prospects.notes: 75,000 SF strip center, 375 parking spaces. Former Big Lots anchor space now vacant — ownership may invest in lot maintenance to attract new tenants.

prospects.name: Saint Vincent College
prospects.notes: Large college campus with multiple parking lots for students, staff, events. Steelers training camp draws huge crowds.

prospects.name: Hempfield Square (Giant Eagle anchor)
prospects.notes: Large grocery-anchored shopping center on busy Rt 30. Giant Eagle + surrounding retail = high traffic lot.

prospects.name: Walmart Supercenter — Latrobe
prospects.notes: Supercenter with massive parking lot. Extreme daily traffic and cart wear. Corporate may outsource lot maintenance.

prospects.name: Lowe's — Latrobe
prospects.notes: Big-box home improvement with large lot. Heavy truck/trailer traffic causes extra wear. Adjacent to Walmart.

prospects.name: Latrobe 30 Shoppes (Scalise Real Estate)
prospects.notes: Multi-tenant strip center on Rt 30. Tractor Supply, retail shops. Locally managed — strong outreach opportunity.

prospects.name: Kennametal Inc. — Latrobe Campus
prospects.notes: Major industrial HQ campus. Large employee parking lots. Industrial traffic = heavy wear patterns.

prospects.name: Arnold Palmer Regional Airport
prospects.notes: 750-acre airport facility with multiple parking lots (Lot A, B, C). Free parking = heavy use. County authority manages.

prospects.name: Hempfield Area School District
prospects.notes: 9 schools, 5,195 students. High school at 4345 Rt 136 has large bus & student parking lots. District manages maintenance centrally.

prospects.name: Greater Latrobe School District
prospects.notes: 5 schools, 3,469 students. Senior High at 131 High School Rd has large lots. District facility decisions from central office.

prospects.name: Seton Hill University
prospects.notes: 200-acre campus. Multiple student/visitor parking lots. University capital budgets often include paving.

prospects.name: Westmoreland County Community College
prospects.notes: Major community college campus with large commuter parking lots. Students/staff daily. ~15 mi from Latrobe.

prospects.name: Greensburg-Salem School District
prospects.notes: 5 schools serving 2,572 students. High school + middle school have sizable lots.

prospects.name: Derry Area School District
prospects.address: 982 N Chestnut St Ext, Derry, PA 15627
prospects.notes: Multiple school buildings with bus and parking lots in the Derry area. ~10 mi from Latrobe.

prospects.name: Christ Our Shepherd Center (Diocese of Greensburg)
prospects.notes: Large conference/retreat center on hilltop along Rt 30. Sizeable parking for events, banquets, meetings.

prospects.name: Saint Vincent Basilica Parish
prospects.notes: Major basilica with large congregation. Shares campus area with college. Significant church parking.

prospects.name: Our Lady of Grace Church
prospects.notes: Founded 1910, large established Catholic parish with dedicated lot. Regular Sunday traffic + events.

prospects.name: Greensburg Alliance Church
prospects.notes: Growing non-denom church aiming to reach 1% of Westmoreland County. Large lot for suburban church site on Rt 136.

prospects.name: Holy Family Catholic Church
prospects.notes: Active parish in central Latrobe. Parking lot serves daily and Sunday Mass. In-town location.

prospects.name: Ligonier Valley School District
prospects.notes: 1,360 students. High school campus with dedicated parking and bus lots. ~15 mi east of Latrobe.

prospects.name: Idlewild & SoakZone
prospects.notes: Large seasonal amusement park with multiple gravel/paved parking areas (Areas A-F). Heavy summer traffic. May need asphalt upgrades.

prospects.name: Smail Auto Group
prospects.notes: Massive multi-brand dealership campus on Rt 30 — 10+ brands, multiple buildings, enormous combined lot for new/used inventory and customer parking. Largest dealer footprint in the area.

prospects.name: Hillview Motors (Chrysler, Jeep, Dodge, Ram)
prospects.notes: Full-line CJDR dealer on Rt 30. Large display lot + customer/service parking. Heavy truck traffic = accelerated wear.

prospects.name: Jim Shorkey Toyota Greensburg
prospects.notes: High-volume Toyota dealer on Rt 30 corridor. Large inventory lot and customer parking area.

prospects.name: Delaney Automotive Greensburg (Chevrolet, Nissan, Volvo)
prospects.notes: Multi-brand campus on Rt 30. Chevy, Nissan, Volvo showrooms and lots all need maintaining.

prospects.name: Latrobe Chevrolet
prospects.notes: Local Chevy dealer with inventory display lot and customer/service parking.

prospects.name: Latrobe Ford
prospects.notes: Ford dealer near Ligonier. Truck traffic causes heavy lot wear.

prospects.name: Laurel Valley Motors (Chrysler Dodge Jeep Ram)
prospects.notes: CJDR dealer on Rt 30 in Latrobe. Part of Laurel Auto Group. Inventory + customer lots.

prospects.name: Sendell Motors (Subaru, Volkswagen)
prospects.notes: Two-brand dealer on Rt 30 corridor. Display + service lot.

prospects.name: Mike Camlin Hyundai of Greensburg
prospects.notes: Hyundai dealer on Rt 30. Growing brand = expanding inventory needs.

prospects.name: Hampton Inn Latrobe
prospects.notes: 24/7 hotel with large guest parking lot on Rt 30. Year-round heavy use. Hotels budget for lot maintenance.

prospects.name: Holiday Inn Express & Suites Greensburg
prospects.notes: Busy IHG hotel with dedicated parking lot. Event and business travel traffic.

prospects.name: Courtyard by Marriott Pittsburgh Greensburg
prospects.notes: Marriott property with sizable lot. Business travelers = steady traffic.

prospects.name: Red Roof Inn Greensburg
prospects.notes: Budget hotel with parking lot needing regular maintenance.

prospects.name: SpringHill Suites by Marriott Latrobe
prospects.notes: Extended-stay hotel. Larger lot for longer-stay guests.

prospects.name: Super 8 by Wyndham Greensburg
prospects.notes: Budget motel with parking lot. Economy properties often defer maintenance = opportunity.

prospects.name: Westmoreland Manor (County-owned nursing home)
prospects.notes: Large county-owned skilled nursing campus with extensive visitor/staff parking. Government procurement = competitive bids.

prospects.name: Redstone Highlands — Greensburg Campus
prospects.notes: Major senior living campus — independent living, personal care, skilled nursing. Multiple parking areas across sprawling grounds.

prospects.name: Redstone Highlands — North Huntingdon Campus
prospects.notes: Second large Redstone campus. Extensive visitor and staff parking.

prospects.name: Redstone Highlands — Murrysville Campus
prospects.notes: Third Redstone campus in the area. All three represent a multi-property contract opportunity.

prospects.name: Brookdale Latrobe (Assisted Living)
prospects.notes: National chain senior living facility. Dedicated parking lot. Corporate may approve local contractors.

prospects.name: Loyalhanna Continuing Care Campus
prospects.notes: 120-bed nursing home + personal care + independent living. Large campus with multiple parking areas.

prospects.name: Excela Square at Frick / Frick Hospital (Independence Health)
prospects.address: 508 S Church St, Mount Pleasant, PA 15666
prospects.notes: 33-bed hospital campus with outpatient services. Visitor, staff, and ER parking. Same health system as Excela Latrobe/Westmoreland — one contact could unlock all.

prospects.name: Aestique Surgical Center
prospects.notes: Outpatient surgery center with dedicated lot. Medical facilities demand well-maintained lots for patient safety.

prospects.name: AHN Westmoreland Outpatient Care Center
prospects.notes: Allegheny Health Network outpatient facility. Corporate health system with local lots to maintain.

prospects.name: Excela Square at Latrobe (Medical offices)
prospects.notes: Medical office complex with outpatient services. Multiple parking areas for patients and staff.

prospects.name: Latrobe Specialty Steel (Timken/Carpenter)
prospects.notes: Major steel manufacturer. #16 employer in county. Huge industrial campus with heavy-vehicle lots. Extreme wear from truck/trailer traffic.

prospects.name: Elliott Group / Ebara Elliott Energy
prospects.notes: #10 largest employer in Westmoreland Co. Major turbomachinery manufacturing campus since 1914. Large employee parking lots.

prospects.name: Philips Respironics (RIST Facility)
prospects.notes: 172,000 SF greenfield facility. #7 employer in county. Large employee parking serving 500+ workers.

prospects.name: Chestnut Ridge Foam
prospects.notes: Foam manufacturing plant in Latrobe Industrial Park. Truck loading areas + employee lot.

prospects.name: UPS Hub — New Stanton
prospects.address: 521 N Center Ave, New Stanton, PA 15672
prospects.notes: Major sorting hub processing ~400,000 packages/day. 1,700+ employees. Massive employee + truck lot. Extreme heavy-vehicle wear.

prospects.name: UNFI Distribution Center
prospects.notes: Large food distribution warehouse. Heavy semi-truck traffic tears up asphalt.

prospects.name: Technimark (Plastics Manufacturing)
prospects.notes: Plastics manufacturer with multiple production facilities. Employee parking + truck yards.

prospects.name: Sun Star Inc. (Contract Manufacturing)
prospects.notes: Custom plastic/metal injection molding manufacturer est. 1995. Industrial campus with employee lots.

prospects.name: Product Evaluation Systems, Inc.
prospects.notes: Independent mechanical/chemical testing laboratory. Small-mid industrial lot.

prospects.name: S & S Tools, Inc.
prospects.notes: Tool manufacturing facility on Rte 981. Industrial lots with heavy equipment traffic.

prospects.name: Westinghouse Electric Co. (Local facility)
prospects.notes: #9 employer in the county. Local office/facility with employee parking.

prospects.name: LeedsWorld Inc.
prospects.notes: #12 employer in the county — promotional products distributor. Warehouse + office facility with sizable lot.

prospects.name: KWPA (Kennametal-related supply)
prospects.address: 530 N Center Ave, New Stanton, PA 15672
prospects.notes: Industrial supply warehouse in New Stanton commercial corridor. Heavy truck traffic.

prospects.name: Chelsea Building Products (New facility at Commerce Crossing)
prospects.notes: Breaking ground on 228,000 SF manufacturing facility. Brand new lot will need maintenance contracts from day one.

prospects.name: Latrobe Industrial Park (Multiple tenants)
prospects.address: Warehouse Dr / Center Dr, Latrobe, PA 15650
prospects.notes: Multi-tenant industrial park with shared and individual parking/loading areas. Approach park management for multi-tenant contract.

prospects.name: Tree of Life Church
prospects.notes: Growing non-denominational church. Churches with growth often expand/repave parking.

prospects.name: Latrobe United Methodist Church
prospects.notes: Established Methodist congregation. Sunday traffic + event parking.

prospects.name: Latrobe Presbyterian Church
prospects.notes: Historic downtown church. Dedicated parking lot serves congregation and community events.

prospects.name: Latrobe United Presbyterian Church
prospects.notes: Established Presbyterian congregation with dedicated parking area.

prospects.name: Trinity Evangelical Lutheran Church
prospects.notes: Historic Lutheran church (est. 1800s). Owns multiple lots on Weldon Street.

prospects.name: Bethany Church Latrobe
prospects.notes: Active church with rear parking lot. Website mentions parking availability.

prospects.name: Latrobe Alliance Church
prospects.notes: Christian & Missionary Alliance congregation. Suburban church = dedicated lot.

prospects.name: First Presbyterian Church of Greensburg
prospects.notes: Large historic downtown congregation. Office hours M-F. Parking lot for congregation.

prospects.name: Church of the Open Door
prospects.notes: Established Greensburg church on Main St with parking.

prospects.name: First Evangelical Lutheran Church — Greensburg
prospects.notes: Established congregation with parking needs.

prospects.name: St. Agnes Church
prospects.notes: Active Catholic parish in Diocese of Greensburg. Suburban location = large dedicated lot.

prospects.name: Holy Trinity Parish — Ligonier
prospects.notes: Catholic parish in Ligonier. Part of Diocese of Greensburg. Church + event parking.

prospects.name: Mt. Pleasant Church of God
prospects.address: 936 W Main St, Mount Pleasant, PA 15666
prospects.notes: Active church on busy W Main St in Mt. Pleasant. Dedicated parking lot.

prospects.name: Calvary Chapel of Westmoreland
prospects.notes: Non-denominational church serving Greensburg, Irwin, Latrobe areas. Growing congregation = lot expansion potential.

prospects.name: St. James Evangelical Lutheran Church
prospects.notes: Lutheran church in Unity Township, near Latrobe. Suburban location with parking lot.

prospects.name: First United Methodist Church — Derry
prospects.notes: UMC church in Derry with parking lot for Sunday and weekly services.

prospects.name: Community United Methodist Church — Irwin
prospects.notes: UMC congregation in Irwin. Suburban church with parking.

prospects.name: Latrobe Elks Lodge / Golf Club
prospects.notes: Elks lodge + 18-hole golf course. Large clubhouse parking lot + seasonal heavy event traffic.

prospects.name: Unity Township American Legion Post 982
prospects.notes: Active legion post with parking lot. Hosts fish fries, events, community gatherings.

prospects.name: Norwin Elks Lodge 2313
prospects.notes: 22-acre site with lodge building and parking. Near PA Turnpike exit 67. Large event venue.

prospects.name: Norwin School District
prospects.notes: 7 schools, ~5,000 students. Large suburban district. High school + multiple bus lots. #14 employer in county.

prospects.name: Penn-Trafford School District
prospects.address: 1006 Harrison City/Export Rd, PO Box 530, Harrison City, PA 15636
prospects.notes: 7+ schools. Serves Penn Twp, Trafford, parts of Jeannette. Multiple bus/student parking lots.

prospects.name: Jeannette City School District
prospects.notes: ~930 students. Smaller district but school buildings still have parking/bus lots needing maintenance.

prospects.name: Southmoreland School District
prospects.notes: Multiple schools. Serves Scottdale/Alverton area. Bus and student parking across campus.

prospects.name: Mount Pleasant Area School District
prospects.notes: Serves Mt. Pleasant Twp. Multiple school buildings with parking/bus lots.

prospects.name: Westmoreland County Courthouse Complex
prospects.notes: County government campus — courthouse, jail, office buildings. Multiple employee and public parking lots. Government procurement.

prospects.name: Westmoreland County Community College — Satellite campuses
prospects.notes: WCCC has satellite campuses beyond main Youngwood campus — each has parking for commuter students.

prospects.name: University of Pittsburgh — Greensburg
prospects.notes: 4-year Pitt branch campus. Multiple student/staff parking lots on 219-acre campus.

prospects.name: Westmoreland County Transit Authority
prospects.notes: Bus authority with maintenance facility, park-and-ride lots, and bus turnaround areas throughout county.

prospects.name: Palace Theatre / Westmoreland Cultural Trust
prospects.notes: 1,369-seat historic theater. Patron parking lot + adjacent lots for events.

prospects.name: Greensburg Garden & Civic Center
prospects.notes: Event venue for groups up to 200. Parking for events, weddings, civic meetings.

prospects.name: Westmoreland Museum of American Art
prospects.notes: Major art museum. Visitor parking lot. Cultural institution with capital budgets.

prospects.name: Greensburg YMCA
prospects.notes: Community fitness center with pool, gym, childcare. Member parking lot used daily.

prospects.name: Lincoln Highway Experience Museum
prospects.notes: Tourist attraction on historic Lincoln Highway. Visitor parking lot.

prospects.name: Latrobe Borough Municipal Building
prospects.notes: Municipal building with public parking. Borough maintenance contracts.

prospects.name: Live! Casino Pittsburgh
prospects.notes: 100,000 SF casino at Westmoreland Mall. 24/7/365 operation = extreme lot wear. 750 slots, 40 tables — heavy patron traffic.

prospects.name: Target — Greensburg
prospects.notes: National retailer with large lot on Rt 30. High daily traffic. Corporate may use local subs.

prospects.name: Giant Eagle — Latrobe (Mountain Laurel Plaza)
prospects.notes: Major supermarket with large parking lot. Daily grocery traffic = steady wear. Part of Mountain Laurel Plaza.

prospects.name: Giant Eagle — Jeannette
prospects.notes: Full-size supermarket with large dedicated parking lot. Constant traffic.

prospects.name: ALDI — Latrobe
prospects.notes: Discount grocer with dedicated lot. ALDI properties are typically well-maintained — they buy local paving.

prospects.name: ALDI — Greensburg
prospects.notes: Second ALDI location in the target area. Same maintenance standards.

prospects.name: DeLallo Italian Marketplace
prospects.notes: Large specialty Italian market/restaurant on Rt 30. Popular regional destination with sizable parking lot. High weekend traffic.

prospects.name: Eastgate Shopping Center
prospects.notes: Shopping center on Rt 30 in Greensburg. Multi-tenant strip with shared parking field.

prospects.name: St. Marys Plaza
prospects.notes: High-traffic, well-established center in densely populated neighborhood.

prospects.name: Mountain Laurel Plaza
prospects.notes: Large shopping plaza. Even if main lot was recently redone, outparcels and secondary lots may need work. Verify current condition.

prospects.name: Ferrante's Lakeview (Restaurant/Banquet)
prospects.notes: Family-owned restaurant and event venue on Rt 30. Large parking lot for banquet events (200+ guests).

prospects.name: Latrobe Country Club
prospects.notes: Arnold Palmer's historic private club. Large member/event parking. Prestigious property that demands quality lot maintenance.

prospects.name: Pantalone Funeral Home
prospects.notes: Established funeral home in Greensburg. Parking lot is critical for service days.

prospects.name: Leo M. Bacha Funeral Home — Greensburg
prospects.notes: Funeral home with parking lots. Also has Pleasant Unity location. Two lots = potential multi-site deal.

prospects.name: Leo M. Bacha Funeral Home — Pleasant Unity
prospects.notes: Second Bacha location. Two parking lots behind the funeral home as well as another across the street.

prospects.name: Mason-Gelder Funeral Home
prospects.notes: Established funeral home in Jeannette with parking lot.

prospects.name: Kepple-Graft Funeral Home
prospects.notes: Funeral home in Greensburg. Visitor parking lot maintenance is priority for funeral homes.

prospects.name: Gordon Food Service Store
prospects.notes: Commercial food supply store. Larger lot for restaurant/catering customer trucks.

prospects.name: Tractor Supply Co. — Latrobe
prospects.notes: Farm/ranch supply store. Customers often bring trailers — heavy load on lot.

prospects.name: Shop 'n Save / Save-A-Lot — various locations
prospects.notes: Discount grocers with parking lots across the county. Multiple potential sites.

prospects.name: Westmoreland County Fairgrounds
prospects.notes: Fairgrounds with large gravel/paved lots for annual fair and year-round events. Asphalt upgrade or repaving opportunity.

prospects.name: Greensburg Shopping Center
prospects.notes: Established retail center. Multi-tenant lot.

prospects.name: Ashley D.X. Nye Cremation Care Funeral Home
prospects.notes: Funeral home serving Greensburg/Latrobe area. Parking lot maintenance essential.

prospects.name: Greensburg Salem Middle School (standalone lot)
prospects.notes: Middle school with its own bus loop and parking lot — separate from the district HS already in original list.

prospects.name: Westmoreland County Community College — Advanced Technology Center
prospects.notes: Satellite training center with its own commuter parking lot. Separate from main campus.
